snippet: If you missed Patrick Watson, the opera-singing Brooklyn cheesemonger, singing “The Star-Spangled Banner” on Monday before more than 16,000 basketball fans, here’s a chance to get caught up.
abstract: If you missed Patrick Watson, the opera-singing Brooklyn cheesemonger, singing “The Star-Spangled Banner” on Monday before more than 16,000 basketball fans, here’s a chance to get caught up.

headline.main: For a Cheeseman's Barclays Debut, Hit Play
